actionTemplate.title: Two-tone concealer: correct + brighten
steps: Use a correcting tone to neutralize dullness and darkness (redness/under-eyes).
Use a brightening tone on hollows: tear trough, nasolabial, under-eye bag.
Mix corrector+brightener for local dull patches and acne marks.
Apply with tiny taps; blend edges with sponge.
Set only creasy zones; keep the rest natural.

rationaleTemplate: Correct + brighten looks natural and beginner-friendly.
Targeted setting keeps coverage without drying skin.
